cms.query.QueryText: SELECT cart.ShoppingCartID,cartSKU.CartItemID,cartSKU.CartItemDistributorID,sku.SKUNumber,sku.SKUName,cartSKU.SKUUnits,sku.SKUPrice, cart.ShoppingCartInventoryType FROM COM_ShoppingCart cart INNER JOIN COM_ShoppingCartSKU cartSKU ON cart.ShoppingCartID= cartSKU.ShoppingCartID INNER JOIN COM_SKU sku ON cartSKU.SKUID=sku.SKUID WHERE CartItemDistributorID=@CartItemDistributorID AND cart.ShoppingCartInventoryType=@ShoppingCartInventoryType AND cart.ShoppingCartCampaignID= CASE WHEN ShoppingCartInventoryType=2 THEN @ShoppingCartCampaignID ELSE 0 END
